ComicInfo.Summary:
The tournament begins and the best fighters around the world are more than ready to climb to the top. Everyone of them has an own reason to win it. Some are there for the glory of victory, others for the thrill of the battle, others will sacrifice everything just for payback. In the end, someone has a score to settle, and the tournament is nothing but an excuse to begin the never-ending battle.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-ii-turbo-1/4000-140648/
